statement.p: In 16 of the last 50 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{50}}={0.16}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{50}. \displaystyle{P}={0.16}\cdot{50}={8}. We round that as requested to 8 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
